title: Rumble In The Jungle
casefile_description: Our sources tell disturbing news from the deep jungle. Witch-doctor has turned whole village into zombies. We need to help!
win_result: Our agent outsmarted the doctor's spells! The villagers rejoyced. $ITEM proved to be especially helpful.
loss_result: Witch-doctor turned out agent into a frog. $ITEM especially were of no help...
